resources.string: “What if ... None of the innovations we enjoy today could have happened without individuals who were willing to go beyond the available knowledge to explore the What If inside of their own mind.” - - Lisa Abeyta\n\n

string.name: ins2
string.b:
Asking a question that begins with "What if" helps us discover what happens when we try something new. These “what ifs” encourage innovators to take risks, make mistakes, discover, invent or create, ignite imagination and inspire challenge the status quo. They aren’t always the solution, but they’re starting points.

 Constructive questions empower and create new possibilities. They lead to action.

string.name: ins4
string.b:
1. Create as many possible answers as possible.
 You have 30 seconds.
 2. Press button “+” when get new answer.
 3. Be honest.

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: What if you have doppelganger?
What if you will catch goldfish? What wishes would you tell?
What if you have million dollars?
What if today is your last day?
What if tomorrow you will become Bill Gates?
What if a sea waters has no salt?
What if you fell into a black hole?
What if Earth were twice as big?
What if everyone on Earth jumped at once?
What if all the cats in the world suddenly died?
What if you only ate one type of food?
What if there were no seasons?
What if you could be free?
What if you change your gender for a day?
What if you woke up in a world that had absolutely no crime?
What if your pet could only talk to you at midnight for an hour?
What if you could live in Harry Potter world?
What if you could find the strength to forgive anyone, no matter how badly they have hurt you?
What if you could make someone fall in love with you?
What if electricity and any other power source was unavailable for a full week?
What if you were unable to smile for a full month?
What if you woke up and your body was made out of bacon?
What if you found out all the answers to the greatest mysteries in the world?
What if you could create your own TV?
What if you could be invisible?
What if elephants could fly?
What if women ruled the world?
What if teachers earned as much as rock stars?
What if no one were allowed to earn more than $100,000 a year?
What if there was no music in the world?
What if war declared illegal?
What if there were twice more mountains?
What if you got magic printer which could print real money?
What if you met Mark Zuckerberg?
What if people slept 23 hours a day and were awake for only 1?
